locations.name: Indrapur HQ
locations.description: The nerve center of Bharatvarsh's military government. This fortress-like complex houses the Military Council, strategic command facilities, and the technology that coordinates the Mesh across the nation. Access is strictly controlled; surveillance here is absolute.

features.name: Command Suite
features.description: The General's domain. A holographic war table dominates the center, projecting real-time data from across Bharatvarsh. Ambient lighting shifts with alert levels. Every surface can become a display.

features.name: War-Room
features.description: Tactical operations center with tiered seating for analysts. Wall-spanning displays show troop movements, infrastructure status, and threat assessments. Air recycled and temperature controlled for 24-hour operations.

features.name: Helipad Complex
features.description: Rooftop landing zone for hoverships and conventional aircraft. Automated defense systems. Direct elevator access to Command Suite. Wind barriers and all-weather capability.

features.name: Motorcade Interface
features.description: Underground vehicle bay with direct highway access. Armored transport fleet. Real-time route optimization connected to Mesh traffic control. Blast-resistant entry points.

locations.atmosphere: Cold precision. Every surface reflects authority. The hum of systems never stops.

media.ambiance: mechanical hum, distant communications, climate control

locations.name: Lakshmanpur
locations.description: The industrial heartland of northern Bharatvarsh. Foundries, manufacturing plants, and research facilities spread across a planned urban grid. The Mesh infrastructure here is dense, monitoring both production quotas and worker movements. Efficiency defines daily life.

features.name: Industrial Corridor
features.description: Kilometers of automated factories and assembly plants. Rail connections move materials around the clock. Emissions carefully monitored and controlled.

features.name: Worker Blocks
features.description: Standardized housing for industrial workforce. Community centers, ration distribution points, and healthcare facilities integrated. Movement tracked by shift schedules.

features.name: Research Campus
features.description: Advanced technology development. Military contracts drive most projects. Security clearances determine access levels.

locations.atmosphere: Smoke-tinged air. The rhythm of machinery. Pride in production.

media.ambiance: factory sounds, transport vehicles, work announcements

locations.name: Mysuru
locations.description: The technological heart of the Deccan. Where Lakshmanpur builds with steel, Mysuru builds with code. Software development, communications infrastructure, and the systems that run the Mesh itself are developed here. A different kind of controlâ€”invisible but pervasive.

features.name: Tech Towers
features.description: Glass and steel structures housing development teams. Climate-controlled, heavily surveilled, connected to the Mesh at every level.

features.name: Data Centers
features.description: The physical infrastructure of digital control. Redundant systems, hardened against attack. The Mesh's memory lives here.

features.name: Old Quarter
features.description: Pre-Mesh architecture preserved as heritage zone. Traditional markets operating under modern oversight. A reminder of what came before.

locations.atmosphere: Clean streets. Soft glow of screens. The quiet hum of servers.

locations.name: Kolkata Corridor
locations.description: The Eastern trade nexus, where goods flow between Bharatvarsh and the outside world. This region never fully accepted central control; the Mesh is denser here, but so is resistance. Port facilities and trading houses operate under intense scrutiny.

features.name: Port Complex
features.description: Massive shipping facilities handling international trade. Every container scanned, every manifest verified. The Mesh meets the outside world.

features.name: Trading Houses
features.description: Commercial operations with pre-Mesh roots. Guild networks maintain influence here, navigating between profit and compliance.

features.name: Old City
features.description: Dense urban fabric from before the Year-Turn. Narrow lanes challenge surveillance coverage. Checkpoint density highest in Bharatvarsh.

locations.atmosphere: Salt air. Commercial energy. Watchful eyes everywhere.

media.ambiance: ship horns, market noise, checkpoint announcements
